page.title: 05OLD WIVES LEES
page.content: Old Wives Lees is a small hamlet.There are many different buildings here.There is a Methodist Chapel which is used every other Sunday.There is a public house called the Star Inn.There is a Post Office that sells food,sweets as well as stamps.Out side the Post Office is a telephone box and a post box.Opposite the Post Office there are some Oast houses.The Mission Hall is used for many different things like Girl's Friendly Society and other meetings. There is another shop called the Rose Way Stores.It sells almost anything.There are also apple and cherry orchards.Near the Star there is a playing field which is fun to play in because there are swings,a see saw, a climbing frame and a roundabout.
